role.descr: location refering to tissue, organelle, person, gene

example.text: Mutations which prevent repressor binding to either site or alter the phasing of the binding sites result in simultaneous derepression of both genes.
example.arg: the phasing of the binding sites

example.text: Moreover, Dam methylation inhibits binding of Lrp/PapI near the GATC1028 site and alters binding of Lrp at the GATC1130 site.
example.arg: binding of Lrp at the GATC1130 site

example.text: Moreover, a fruR null mutation altered the rates of utilization of at least 36 carbon sources.
example.arg: the rates of utilization of at least 36 carbon sources

example.text: The results provide insight into a mechanism whereby altered expression of Bcl-3 leads to tumorigenic potential.
